reviews.review_msg: Never accessible outside of class, one time I really needed to contact her and she never replied, she says "feel free to reach out for any questions" but never ever replies and this was also what many other students experienced to the point that we had to email each other for clarification because the prof never replied. Easy but not worth it

Lectures became her just showing up to class & making AI read her notes for half an hour while she sat there. Rest of the class of watching videos & answering questions on canvas. Didn't learn much & is a hard marker. Great feedback on papers but would have been better if she had explained what she wanted before the assignments.

If you can, avoid this prof! While she is nice, it is genuinely impossible to get ahold of outside of class. She never replies to emails, changes due dates, has mismatched details on assignments. Her disorganization has a big impact on the stress of a student, really makes you grateful for the profs who are attentive and care.
Very lovely prof - you can tell that she cares; however, she is quite disorganized and lectures can become rather dull as they aren't that engaging and quite slow.
